channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.description: A walk up to the Finlas reservoir and beyond this morning. Overcast & low clouds, fine rain. Cuckoos. A couple of hares on the way up, 3 on the way back. A hill fox. Tons of tiny wee wild flowers among the grass. Deer ,ravens, & more flora & fauna: walkmap https://t.co/YSAVEfg9Eh https://t.co/6bcFei3p5v
Had a lot of fun brightening up some art and putting on a digital wall today. https://t.co/p4dLyRbwiW
Welsh Poppy in the evening light https://t.co/rxqeAWZ5ZR

Garscube Estate Bridge, has a wee walk this afternoon. Saw a kingfisher bullet under the bridge and a few minutes later two thrill up the river. Bluebells, wild garlic, garlic muster & stitchwort. Hawthorn in full blossom. Overcast occasional rain drops & sunbeams. https://t.co/xEC55yObdP
@jimgroom Thank you Jim. I take my chances with auto focus (and everything else) https://t.co/9mjzrS7uri
A couple of roe in the reeds. Earlier we saw a mallard lead a large brood across the road. https://t.co/0R4ia249Pv
Bye Bye iPod: https://t.co/Wvada3YVkp
@athole #learningforlifeandwork ü§£

Working on the help for #GlowBlogs. This is spread over several sites. Keeping inter links between them all takes time. Now sharing a H5P column to do this, update once & it goes to all the other sites. https://t.co/pskM4DxShE
Blue Moon over the park early this evening. https://t.co/V9qxveqVlM

A nice walk around Ardinning Wildlife reserve on Sunday morn, very quiet. Cuckoos, curlews & other singing & calling. Images: Ardinning Loch, caterpillar, wood anemone, bluebells, dandelion & a green veined white. https://t.co/wbH4VVYKKx

Over the last few years I‚Äôve had quite a bit of fun with micro:bits. Given I‚Äôve been using the same ones all that time they were pretty good value. It is great to see them getting a bit more traction in Scottish schools. We are to get some more free‚Ä¶ https://t.co/t4M7d6yAys https://t.co/GtflJ3djBj
Spending some time updating the #GlowBlogs embedding content examples, #microbit & #scratch projects, pdfs and a ton more: https://t.co/o1O3UCoZMj
And you can share your learning with #GlowBlogs by embedding your micro:bit simulator in a post: https://t.co/PAqNn3vczV https://t.co/kY4vWj4vjP
The WP Accessibility plugin in #GlowBlogs provided a nice reminder to help visitors. It lets you know if you forget to add Alt text. #Accessibility https://t.co/thM6VHuM9O https://t.co/mQffE6AqNu
Hawthorn, may is coming out. https://t.co/GAv3HR6G6S
OneDrive woes and fixes: https://t.co/ziqnRIuWyr

The application ‚Äúhttps://t.co/NOVcWG9Gbq‚Äù is not open anymore. Not the most welcome of messages on arriving at school this morn. Especially when the app will not open. After trying the obvious, installed the new version. OneDrive processing 1000s of changes. Not what I need.
@ds106dc #tdc3763 working on the #ds106 time machine, leaving the world of B&W behind. https://t.co/z6yWGxJ7mK

@joedale showed me some of the audacity content of his podcasting course, really deep & useful stuff. I‚Äôve used audacity for 17 years (eek!) & was riveted. Bonus for Scots education you can host a podcast for free with #glowblogs. https://t.co/QJVhX7Srvl
Had a nice walk this morn, full of bird song, flora and cloud. Notes, photos and map: walkmap https://t.co/mGVLUY4V59 https://t.co/58o4jOz5hS
By the Finlas Reservoir this morning, lots of cuckoos calling. https://t.co/U54S31hBfv https://t.co/tP9jrOkkbR
